Specimen Type: Serum or plasma (LEMON); Serum (IGE and general serum assays)
Purpose: To provide accurate and reliable measurement of the LEMON analyte, Immunoglobulin E (IgE) levels, and routine serum biochemical parameters.
Container: Serum-separating tube (SST), heparinized tube, or plain red-top tube
Equipment: Designated analyzers for Lemon, IgE, and serum assays; standard laboratory equipment such as centrifuges and pipettes
